page.title: 06Nursing,Swanton Morley 2
page.content:
Nurse Martin is not on call 3 nights out of the 10 from 8.p.m.-8.a.m., but answers emergencies nevertheless.
Her working day starts at 8.a.m. and continues until 6.p.m. and often 9.p.m. She visits 1)diabetic patients, 2)new babies, 3)post operative patients, 4)dressings(boils, septic wounds, gangrene), 5)the dying, in that order to avoid cross infection. If travelling distance means treating "dirty" wounds out of order, she will swap that patient to another nurse to avoid infection.
There are 49 patients between 4 nurses. Her present calls include 13 babies, 5 ante natal cases, 2 dressings, 3 post amputations and 2 car accidents.
